description: Cut from lightweight cotton-blend jersey that is made with recycled polyester and has a heathered look. Allover print with the Double RL logo is inspired by Midwestern ranch and bandanna motifs. Yarn-dyed contrast binding at the collar and cuffs. Heavily laundered for a sun-faded, vintage appearance.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 27.5" front body length, an 18.5" shoulder, and a 40" chest.
Visit corporate.RalphLauren.com/citizenship-create-timeless-style for more information on Ralph Lauren's sustainability initiatives.
